comments:
Using M6.

When you have an invalid predefined target, it is possible to get the following SWTException.  While clearly an invalid predefined target is not a good thing, it would be nice if PDE failed either quietly, or in some manner other than a stack trace being written to the log.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 0 2007-05-02 10:33:06.194
!MESSAGE org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3499)

	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3393)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:432)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text.getText(Text.java:990)
